conversion_verification.notes: Successful isometric cutaway conversion with consistent geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall thickness. Prototypical isometric projection used effectively.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High layout fidelity. Wall placement and room adjacencies for Bed-1, Bed-2, and Living/Dining are accurate.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture matches the 2D plan closely, including the dining set, sofas, and kitchen appliances.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean lighting and materials. Minor loss of points for high exterior walls that partially clip some views, but overall very readable.

detected_errors.description: Minor window size discrepancies on the facade compared to original plan callouts.

summary: A highly faithful 3D transformation that preserves the exact layout and furniture arrangement of the architectural floor plan.
